get.description:
Retrieve the list of quota limitations currently in force for the user, as well
as their progress towards those quotas

schema.title: Response Read Quotas Billing Quotas Get

get.description: Retrieve a list of configurations owned by the current user

post.description:
Launch a new configuration cluster for the current user
Still need to handle ownership once we have JWT authentication implemented.

timeout.description: Example configuration demonstrating how to tweak database parameters

get.description: Retrieve status and metadata for the specified configuration

number.description: The identifier for a custom configuration

delete.description: Delete the specified configuration and its associated data

number.description: The identifier for a custom configuration

patch.description: Update an existing configuration cluster, (e.g. provision more IOPS, change node type)

number.description: The identifier for a custom configuration

timeout.description: Example configuration demonstrating how to update an existing config

get.description: Retrieve a list of databases owned by the current user

post.description: Launch a new database cluster for the current user

standalone.description: Create a new database using a standalone topology

get.description: Retrieve status and metadata for the specified database

delete.description: Delete the specified database and its associated data

patch.description: Update an existing database cluster, (e.g. provision more IOPS, change node type)

rename.description: Change the name of a database

get.description:
Retrieve a list of available database products to choose from (e.g.
Transactional, Analytical, Xpand, …)

schema.title: Response Read Products Offering Products Get

get.description:
Retrieve a list of available cloud providers in which to host the
database (e.g. AWS, GCP, …)

schema.title: Response Read Providers Offering Providers Get

get.description:
Retrieve a list of available geographic regions into which a database cluster
may be deployed (e.g. us-east-2, eu-central-1, …)

schema.title: Response Read Regions Offering Regions Get

get.description: Retrieve a list of available node sizes that may be used for the database cluster

transactional.description:
Deploy a cloud database for transaction processing with persistent storage,
replication, read load balancing and read/write splitting all configured
out of the box and ready to go.

schema.title: Response Read Sizes Offering Sizes Get

get.description:
Retrieve a list of available tiers into which a database cluster may be deployed
(e.g. Dedicated cluster, Mutli-tenancy, …)

schema.title: Response Read Tiers Offering Tiers Get

get.description:
Retrieve a list of valid topologies for a specified product which may be deployed
(e.g. Transactional + MaxScale, Analytical-Standalone + ColumnStore Single Node)

transactional.description:
Deploy a cloud database for transaction processing with persistent storage,
replication, read load balancing and read/write splitting all configured
out of the box and ready to go.

schema.title: Response Read Topologies Offering Topologies Get

get.description:
Retrieve a list of valid database versions which may be chosen for database
deployment (e.g. 10.4, 10.5, …)

schema.title: Response Read Versions Offering Versions Get

get.description: Redirect the user to the docs if they hit the root path

ConfigurationUpdate.title: ConfigurationUpdate
ConfigurationUpdate.description: Request body to update a configuration

DatabaseUpdate.title: DatabaseUpdate
DatabaseUpdate.description: Request body to update a database - currently limited to name only

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Generic message body containing error details for failed requests

NewConfigurationRequest.title: NewConfigurationRequest
NewConfigurationRequest.description: Request body to create a new MariaDB Configuration

NewDatabase.title: NewDatabase
NewDatabase.description: Request body to create a new MariaDB cluster deployed by SkySQL

Provider.title: Provider
Provider.description: Cloud provider, e.g. AWS or GCP

Region.title: Region
Region.description: Geographic region, as defined by the providers

Size.title: Size
Size.description: Node size, as defined by the providers

Tier.title: Tier
Tier.description: Availability tier, e.g. dedicated or shared tenancy

Topology.title: Topology
Topology.description: Cluster topology valid for a particular product, e.g. Standalone or MaxScale
